searchDocument

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> searchDocument(java.lang.Integer docmentId)
Description copied from interface: Retriever
Retrieves the terms contained in the given document. Each term is mapped to its frequency in the document.

Specified by:
searchDocument in interface Retriever
Parameters:
docmentId - a document identifier.
Returns:
the terms mapped to their frequency in the document.

searchTerm

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> searchTerm(java.lang.String term)
Description copied from interface: Retriever
Retrieves the documents containing the given term. Each document is mapped to the frequency of the term in the document.

Specified by:
searchTerm in interface Retriever
Parameters:
term - a term.
Returns:
the document id's mapped to the frequency of the contained term.
